text: == Events == * March 3 – The Treaty of San Stefano ends the Russo-Turkish War. * June 12 – July 12 – Congress of Berlin meets to talk about the independence of the Balkans following the Russo-Turkish War. * Ipswich Town F.C. founded * Everton F.C. founded * Manchester United F.C. founded == Deaths == * February 7 – Pope Pius IX (b. 1792)
